PHQ9.original: Little interest or pleasure in doing things?

variants.text: Since exams started, have you stopped enjoying things you used to love?
Have you been skipping hangouts because nothing feels fun anymore?
With everything going on, have you been feeling really down or hopeless?
With family pressure, have you been feeling emotionally crushed or hopeless?

PHQ9.original: Trouble falling or staying asleep, or sleeping too much?

variants.text: Due to exam stress, are you struggling to sleep or sleeping excessively?
Are worries keeping you awake at night or making you sleep all day?

PHQ9.original: Feeling tired or having little energy?

variants.text: Even after resting, do you feel exhausted from studies or expectations?
Do you feel drained even without doing much?
Has stress caused you to eat much more or much less than usual?
Have your eating habits changed because of how you’re feeling emotionally?

PHQ9.original: Feeling bad about yourself or that you are a failure or have let yourself or your family down?

variants.text: Do you feel like you’ve disappointed your parents or family?
Do you often feel you’re not good enough or a failure?

PHQ9.original: Trouble concentrating on things, such as reading the newspaper or watching television?

variants.text: Is it difficult to focus while studying or attending classes?
Do your thoughts wander even during simple activities?

PHQ9.original: Moving or speaking so slowly that other people could have noticed, or being so restless that you move around a lot more than usual?

variants.text: Have you been unusually slow or extremely restless lately?
Have people commented that you seem withdrawn or overly restless?

PHQ9.original: Thoughts that you would be better off dead, or of hurting yourself?

variants.text: Have you had thoughts about not wanting to exist anymore?
Have you thought about harming yourself or ending your life?

GAD7.original: Feeling nervous, anxious, or on edge?

variants.text: Before exams or deadlines, do you feel constantly on edge?
Around people, do you feel anxious or tense?

GAD7.original: Not being able to stop or control worrying?

variants.text: Do worries about your future or career feel uncontrollable?
Do anxious thoughts keep looping in your mind?

GAD7.original: Worrying too much about different things?

variants.text: Do you worry excessively about studies, family, and future all at once?
Do small issues quickly turn into big worries?
Even when free, do you struggle to fully relax?
Does your body stay tense even when nothing is happening?

GAD7.original: Being so restless that it’s hard to sit still?

variants.text: During classes or meetings, do you feel unable to sit calmly?
Do you feel physically restless most of the time?
Do small things make you irritated or angry quickly?
Have friends or family noticed you getting irritated easily?

GAD7.original: Feeling afraid as if something awful might happen?

variants.text: Do you constantly feel something bad is about to happen?
Do thoughts of worst-case scenarios keep coming to your mind?
